Class LossyLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sim.SimEnt
      • Sim.Link
        • Sim.LossyLink

  • public class LossyLink
extends Link
    This implements a link with loss, jitter and delay.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LossyLink

        public LossyLink(float delay,
                 float jitter,
                 float droprate)
        Parameters:
        delay - Avrage delay of message passing thru this link. (ms)
        jitter - Jitter of the link. Random uniform distribution. (ms)
        droprate - Droprate of the link as probability from 0.0 - 1.0.
